meanings.definition: Seemingly; as far as one knows or can see.
meanings.sent1: She apparently finished her homework early.
meanings.sent3: The cat apparently thought the toy mouse was real.
meanings.sent4: The stars in the sky apparently twinkle at night.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's smile apparently brightened the classroom.

meanings.definition: Used to introduce a statement that seems surprising or unlikely.
meanings.sent1: Apparently, the sun rises in the west.
meanings.sent2: The movie was good; apparently, it received terrible reviews.
meanings.sent3: Apparently, pigs can fly in cartoons.
meanings.sent4: His excuses were as thin as paper, apparently.
meanings.sent5: The cat's meow apparently signaled the start of the concert.
